name: Penelope Polter and the B.U.G.
description:
FacetStarlight is a hobby game studio composed of Leviticus, SoapyBits, and Cabooski! We build 3D games and VRchat content for fun in our spare time.

We also manage an inclusive community of creatively minded people on discord, come check it out! https://discord.gg/VQkK9tY

UPDATE:

Fixed an error that made the final cutscene not trigger.
